name: Gehnas Demo
description:
This is a Demo I made to show off the assets I've produced and will be using to make a full game, known as Gehnas. It's a platformer with a heavy emphasis on speed and going fast, using a weapon to grind along rails. 

Controls: 

Arrow Keys for Movement, Z to Jump/Confirm, and X for the weapon. Can be rebound.

Made in Gamemaker 2, Music was made in Cakewalk.
